Package com.umarabdul.networking.jmailer

Class JMailer

Object
com.umarabdul.networking.jmailer.JMailer
public class JMailer
extends Object
JMailer is a simple library for sending emails using an SMTP server.
Since:
2020
Version:
1.0
Author:
Umar Abdul
